channel.title: Comments on: How to get data out of Microsoft Dynamics Great Plains
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Great tip! Been trying to stay away from the GP front-end but now that I know that's in there I'll use it more.
item.content:encoded: Great tip! Been trying to stay away from the GP front-end but now that I know that’s in there I’ll use it more.
